onlinewebfontscomicon More Trending Articles Machine Learning Tools Machine learning a subset of AI that enables computers to learn from data and improve through experience is a booming segment
Spending around machine learning is expected to grow from about 158 billion in 2017 to 208 billion in 2023 according to a recent report
A variety of sectors including banking government health care life sciences retail and telecom are increasing spending around ML enterprises
Meanwhile a shortage of qualified AI practitioners inhibits even greater progress for many businesses
With the right machine learning tools however data scientists are empowered to optimize ML endeavors
IDENTIFYING ESSENTIAL MACHINE LEARNING TOOLS Similar to data warehousing tools and BI tools  machine learning tools facilitate analytics and a variety of reporting
There might also be overlap with Big Data tools
ML tools establish their own space however via machine learning framework
BASIC TOOLS Common programming languages like Python R Java and C are popular in the ML community
Given the high level of familiarity among data scientists with these languages theres little to no additional learning needed to begin
Depending on the platform and data warehousing situation there may be the need for additional steps with data cleansing and data conversion
Conventional data warehouses slow the ML process and contribute to data wrangling headaches
Fast data tools allow for data scientists to spend more time fine tuning models and less time worrying about waiting for access
Machine learning for data science taps into the tools of the trade and can integrate machine learning tools into a framework
WHAT IS A MACHINE LEARNING FRAMEWORK A machine learning framework is an interface or platform that facilitates the development of machine learning models
They are generally user-friendly optimized for performance and ease of use
Some versions of machine learning framework liberate users of infrastructure management
Others are more scalable and flexible
All machine learning framework comes with some machine learning tools baked in
There are nuances within machine learning framework consistent with the advancements in AI
Deep learning framework is an offshoot of more traditional machine learning framework
Deep learning a subset of ML that refers to deep artificial neural networks varies because of its ability to process unstructured data
Deep learning is used in image and sound recognition for example
Additionally there are numerous options for an open source machine learning framework
SNOWFLAKE AND MACHINE LEARNING TOOLS Snowflake was designed from the ground up to support machine learning and AI-driven data science applications
In conjunction with tight integrations to Spark R Qubole and Python Snowflake is an indispensable Data Science technology
Performance speed is a key factor in supporting robust machine learning models
Snowflake has the capabilities to scale up or scale down
It can also bear the data preparation responsibilities reducing data-related burdens from machine learning tools
Snowflake offers some of the best cloud data analytics capabilities for data scientists and business analysts
Explore it today
VIRTUAL HANDS-ON LAB FROM ZERO TO SNOWFLAKE IN 90 MINUTES This hands-on workshop focuses on increasing your efficiency scaling to your needs and analyzing your data thoroughly
Learn how to create a data warehouse and generate the insights your business needs
Find a workshop near you or online
